thread.title: What’s the greatest driving route in Britain?
thread.title_full: What’s the greatest driving route in Britain? - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: What’s the greatest driving route in Britain?
text: Feeling adventurous? Embark on a Great British Drive » Whether it’s a scenic tour of Wiltshire , a rugged drive from Edinburgh to Dundee or the winding route through the South Downs from Petworth to Goodwood , Britain’s countryside is shot through with some of the world’s most stunning drives. But do you know a greater one? Whether it’s a remote B-road you discovered on holiday or an underappreciated route you drive every day, here’s your chance to share it and win. In the space below, nominate your favourite British driving route and tell us what makes it great. A panel of judges from the Telegraph and Michelin will select the top 10 based on the quality of the descriptions. The top 10 entrants will each win a driving kit including a torch, fleece blanket, scraper glove, thermal mug, digital pressure gauge, tyre tread depth gauge and a holdall to put it all in. One overall winner will also see his or her name in print when motoring journalist David Williams goes on the Great British Drive they nominate. Online Form - What’s the greatest driving route in Britain?
